entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 19.
entry.summary: Showers ending late in the morning then clearing. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 19. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 17 April 2023
